Colombian_sea Dataset

Source: R/colombian_sea.R
Colombian_sea.Rd

The colombian_sea dataset is a simple feature collection with 6 features and 5 fields. This version was obtained from marine regions page: "https://www.marineregions.org/stats_downloads.php"

Colombian_sea

Format

Simple feature collection with 6 features and 5 fields:

MRGID

id from original GDAM

GEONAME

id from original GDAM

SOVEREIGN1

Colombia.

NAME_1

Departamentos.

DEPARTAMEN

class name GDAM.

geometry

order name of GDAM.

Details

This dataset is designed to provide users of mammalcol package with a companion map to plot the mammal distribution per departamento.

References

The dataset is based on the "List of the Mammals of Colombia" by Ramírez-Chaves 2021.

See also

For more information about the "mammalcol" package and the data sources, visit the package's GitHub repository: https://github.com/dlizcano/mammalcol

Author

Data compilation: Ramírez-Chaves 2021, Function implementation: Cristian A. Cruz-R.

Examples


# Load the mammalcol package
library (mammalcol)
library (sf)
#> Linking to GEOS 3.12.1, GDAL 3.8.4, PROJ 9.4.0; sf_use_s2() is TRUE

# Access the Colombian_sea dataset
# data ("colombian_sea")

# Display the first few rows
head (Colombian_sea)
#> Simple feature collection with 6 features and 5 fields
#> Geometry type: GEOMETRY
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: -84.8098 ymin: 1.376809 xmax: -70.41768 ymax: 16.05083
#> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
#>   MRGID                                                      GEONAME SOVEREIGN1
#> 1 48971 Overlapping claim: Colombia / Dominican Republic / Venezuela   Colombia
#> 2  8426                            Colombian Exclusive Economic Zone   Colombia
#> 3 62596             Colombian Exclusive Economic Zone (Serrana Bank)   Colombia
#> 4 62598          Colombian Exclusive Economic Zone (Quitasueño Bank)   Colombia
#> 5 48984          Colombian Exclusive Economic Zone (Serranilla Bank)   Colombia
#> 6 48985          Colombian Exclusive Economic Zone (Bajo Nuevo Bank)   Colombia
#>   NAME_1 DEPARTAMEN                       geometry
#> 1  ocean      Ocean POLYGON ((-70.88056 15.0355...
#> 2  ocean      Ocean MULTIPOLYGON (((-71.37836 1...
#> 3  ocean      Ocean POLYGON ((-80.23861 14.6732...
#> 4  ocean      Ocean POLYGON ((-80.90582 14.4975...
#> 5  ocean      Ocean POLYGON ((-80.01819 15.6725...
#> 6  ocean      Ocean POLYGON ((-78.43056 15.8929...

plot (Colombian_sea["NAME_1"])
